title: Email Marketing Template
content: Write a compelling email subject line that increases open rates by focusing on curiosity and urgency. Consider the target audience and their pain points.

title: Code Review Checklist
content: Review the following code for security vulnerabilities, performance issues, and adherence to coding standards. Provide specific suggestions for improvement.

title: Meeting Agenda Builder
content: Create an agenda for a 60-minute team meeting that covers project updates, blocker discussions, and next steps. Include time allocations for each section.

title: Social Media Caption Generator
content: Generate 5 engaging Instagram captions for a product launch. Include relevant hashtags and a call-to-action. Tone should be enthusiastic but authentic.

title: Bug Report Template
content: Document a software bug with steps to reproduce, expected vs actual behavior, environment details, and severity level. Be specific and objective.
